main event: A family in Columbia, South Carolina, observed a ball-shaped object with a tail, similar in size to a basketball, for 2 minutes and 10-15 seconds.
interesting points: The sighting involved four observers who all reported seeing the object for varying durations.
The report includes photographs of the UFO sighting.
The sighting was initially speculated to be caused by a meteor.
The object was described as a 'family ball with tail'.
The observation lasted for over 2 minutes, providing multiple witnesses with the opportunity to observe the object.
